Detailed Description

MiniVEX sensor.

The MiniVEX is a device compatible with the VEX sensor: This device has:

  • 1 VEX servomotor output.
  • 1 analog input pin.
  • 2 digital input/output pins.

The 2 free digital input/output pins can be connected to:

  • 1 VEX encoder.
  • 1 VEX ultrasonic.
  • or free for use.
